description: This file defines the AppTheme class which specifies the theme styling for a Flutter application, including color schemes, app bar styles, card styles, floating action button styles, input decoration styles, and snackbar styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing theme data for a Flutter application, with a private constructor to prevent instantiation and static methods for theme configuration.

methods.name: AppTheme._
methods.description: Private constructor to prevent instantiation of the AppTheme class.

methods.name: light
methods.description: A static method returning a ThemeData object configured for a light theme with specific color schemes, app bar, card, FAB, input, and snackbar styles.
